text: The Saturn Award for Best Streaming Science Fiction, Action & Fantasy Series was introduced at the 45th Saturn Awards, honoring the best streaming series in the genres of science fiction, action and fantasy. (NOTE: Year refers to year of eligibility, the actual ceremonies are held the following year) ==Winners and Nominees== {| class="wikitable" width="550px" border="1" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" align="centre" |- ! width="70px"|Year ! TV Series ! Streaming Service |- | rowspan=7 style="text-align: center;" | 2018 (45th) |style="background:#ddddff"|Star Trek: Discovery |style="background:#ddddff"|CBS All Access |- | Black Mirror | Netflix |- | The Expanse | rowspan="3"|Prime Video |- | Good Omens |- | Jack Ryan |- | Lost in Space | rowspan="2"|Netflix |- | Russian Doll |} ==References== ==See also== * Saturn Award for Best Science Fiction Television Series * Saturn Award for Best Action-Thriller Television Series * Saturn Award for Best Fantasy Television Series * Saturn Award for Best New Media Television Series Category:Saturn Awards
title: Saturn Award for Best Streaming Science Fiction, Action & Fantasy Series
